groupListing.confirmLeaveText: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
groupListing.wouldYouJoin: Would you like to join this group?

toolTip.tip1: Any site member can join this group.
toolTip.tip2: This group will be listed in the groups directory and in search results.
toolTip.tip3: Group content and activity will be visible to any site member.

privacyPublicContent.point1: Any site member can join this group.
privacyPublicContent.point2: This group will be listed in the groups directory and in search results.
privacyPublicContent.point3: Group content and activity will be visible to any site member.

privacyPrivateContent.point1: Only users who request membership and are accepted can join the group.
privacyPrivateContent.point2: This group will be listed in the groups directory and in search results.
privacyPrivateContent.point3: Group content and activity will only be visible to members of the group.

privacyHiddenContent.point1: Only users who are invited can join the group.
privacyHiddenContent.point2: This group will not be listed in the groups directory or search results.
privacyHiddenContent.point3: Group content and activity will only be visible to members of the group.

createGroup.whoCanInvite: Who can invite members to the group?
